job.remarks: LVE 211019 uitgezet, loopt al een tijd niet meer en de queries zijn traag

step.datasource:
SELECT ID as gbkmutid , 1207 as type, 11760 as empid, 'Products' as freetextfield_10,
dbo.Orlaco_RPT_PD_Quarantaine_magazijn_91.aantal AS itemcount, dbo.Orlaco_RPT_PD_Quarantaine_magazijn_91.artikelcode AS artikelcode, dbo.Orlaco_RPT_PD_Quarantaine_magazijn_91.artikelcode2 AS itemcode, dbo.Orlaco_RPT_PD_Quarantaine_magazijn_91.reden AS Description, cast(dbo.Orlaco_RPT_PD_Quarantaine_magazijn_91.costpricestandard as varchar) AS freetextfield_01, dbo.Orlaco_RPT_PD_Quarantaine_magazijn_91.Serienummer AS freetextfield_05, ID as freetextfield_07 FROM dbo.Orlaco_RPT_PD_Quarantaine_magazijn_91 WHERE 1=1 and dbo.Orlaco_RPT_PD_Quarantaine_magazijn_91.Warehousecode = '91'

SELECT ID as gbkmutid, 1206 as type, 11760 as empid, 'Products' as freetextfield_10,
dbo.Orlaco_RPT_PD_Quarantaine_magazijn.aantal AS itemcount, dbo.Orlaco_RPT_PD_Quarantaine_magazijn.artikelcode AS artikelcode, dbo.Orlaco_RPT_PD_Quarantaine_magazijn.artikelcode2 AS itemcode, dbo.Orlaco_RPT_PD_Quarantaine_magazijn.reden AS Description, cast(dbo.Orlaco_RPT_PD_Quarantaine_magazijn.costpricestandard as varchar) AS freetextfield_01, dbo.Orlaco_RPT_PD_Quarantaine_magazijn.Serienummer AS freetextfield_05 FROM dbo.Orlaco_RPT_PD_Quarantaine_magazijn WHERE 1=1 AND dbo.Orlaco_RPT_PD_Quarantaine_magazijn.Warehousecode = ('92')

SELECT ID as gbkmutid, 540 as type, 11760 as empid, 'Products' as freetextfield_10,
dbo.Orlaco_RPT_PD_Quarantaine_magazijn.aantal AS itemcount, dbo.Orlaco_RPT_PD_Quarantaine_magazijn.artikelcode AS artikelcode, dbo.Orlaco_RPT_PD_Quarantaine_magazijn.artikelcode2 AS itemcode, dbo.Orlaco_RPT_PD_Quarantaine_magazijn.reden AS Description, cast(dbo.Orlaco_RPT_PD_Quarantaine_magazijn.costpricestandard as varchar) AS freetextfield_01, dbo.Orlaco_RPT_PD_Quarantaine_magazijn.Serienummer AS freetextfield_05, ID as freetextfield_06 FROM dbo.Orlaco_RPT_PD_Quarantaine_magazijn WHERE 1=1 AND dbo.Orlaco_RPT_PD_Quarantaine_magazijn.Warehousecode = '90'
